description: Lebanese Women Rights and the Nationality Law

subproject.description:
Promote gender equality and women empowerment by providing support towards Establishment of a Project Board (Human and Women’s Right NGO’s) to develop the project strategy in 2008.Recruitment of a senior national consultant to conduct a mapping study on “the impact of discriminatory nationality law” and to assess the impact of the current nationality law on women and their families, and to determine the size of the problem in 2008-2009.

?Recruitment in process for a National Consultant to prepare a training manual on advocacy and Lobbying.
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
subproject.title: Lebanese Women Rights
